alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 11:58AM EST until December 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Snowfall rates of one inch per hour or more are possible. * WHERE...Lucas, Wood, Ottawa and Sandusky counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and heavy snowfall rates leading to reduced visibilities as low as a quarter of a mile at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall is expected between 3 PM this afternoon and 6 PM this evening. Snow will mix with and transition to rain this evening and snow should melt tonight as temperatures rise.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
